snippet: A New Jersey man accused of beating two Rangers fans after the N.H.L. Winter Classic in Philadelphia on Jan. 2 has been sentenced to house arrest.
abstract: Philadelphia Flyers fan Dennis Veteri is sentenced to house arrest for beating two New York Rangers fans after the NHL Winter Classic in Philadelphia.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey man accused of beating two Rangers fans after the N.H.L. Winter Classic in Philadelphia on Jan. 2 has been sentenced to house arrest.
